name: Banana Nut Bread
author: Joan Drury
instructions: Beat shortening and sugar together. Add eggs and beat well. Sift together flour, baking powder, soda and salt. Then add 1/2 bananas and 1/2 flour mixture. Mix well. Add remaining banana and flour mixtures. Mix well. Add chopped walnuts and place in well greased and floured loaf pan. Bake at 350Â° for 40 to 45 minutes. Remove from pan and cool on rack.
